The FT_GlyphSlot_Embolden symbol is from freetype.  It is optionally used by
cairo if the version of freetype used when compiling supports it.

I suspect that you installed a version of cairo which was built against a newer
freetype, but you have an old freetype installed.  I think this is a bug in the
packaging of cairo and should be reported to whomever built that package.

I think that the release notes may contain some reference to this, some people are getting trouble with this same issue (I searched at google).
